0.1.name: wordpress/easy-linkpost
0.1.description:
When contributing a report by Wordpress, many external pages are described using the tag, but it is troublesome. When introducing a link place, it contributes combining a title and URL in many cases, but the procedure is the following procedures.

  1. The page is opened, check the sauce of
  2. pages, copy the contents of the
  3. tags, and insert in contribution.

In order to reduce this time-consuming work very much, when inputting URL, plug-in which keeps a title was created.
